subject: Soccer
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Kristine Lilly, captain of the United States women’s national team for the past three years, is expecting her first child and will miss the Olympics. Lilly, who has been part of all eight United States Women’s World Cup and Olympics teams, said she would not play international soccer in 2008.
